name: Escape From The GLITCH NIGHTMARE
description:
Escape From The GLITCH NIGHTMARE In this game you are trapped alone in a strange room, and you are trying to escape from there, you collect 4 gold keys 1 master key and activate the generator there to open 5 doors to escape! = In-game Objective =
  1. Find the escape door
  2. Find 4 GoldKey
  3. Find Generator & Master Key
  4. Go to the escape door and ESCAPE!
= Controls =
  • W.A.S.D = Move
  • Mouse = Look
  • Q = Open task paper
= Requirements =
  • Play with Headset for better experience
  • Recomended Sound Volume : 50%
= DOWNLOAD = !DOWNLOAD NOW! !Available on Windows, MacOS, Linux! = Support The Developers = If you are interested in this game click DOWNLOAD, If you want to Support YapGamedev SMASH FOLLOW NOW!, If you support the Developers of this FREE game, DONATE as you wish, more donations will make the developer EXCITED to make other games that are more than this game, DON'T HESITATE to Donate, because 1 Donation from you = 10,000 x SPIRIT FOR THIS GAME DEVELOPER!
